scenes.description: The user arrives in a small village on a cliff at night and sees a single lantern by the sea.

llmHints.general: Set up a calm, safe, cozy bedtime atmosphere.
llmHints.fear: Emphasize safety and guidance from the light.

options.text: Walk up to the lantern keeper and say hello.
Sit quietly near the lantern and watch the waves.

scenes.description: The user stands beside the old lantern keeper and interacts with him for the first time.

llmHints.general: Focus on calm conversation and emotional support.
llmHints.sad: Let the keeper listen a lot and answer in a reassuring way.
llmHints.angry: Let the keeper stay calm and grounded.

options.text: Ask the keeper to walk with you along the cliff.
Stay by the lantern and simply listen to him talk.
